Content: Troops of the 613 Brigade of the 61 Division under the Security Force Headquarters - Wanni (SFHQ-W) held a donation programme for under-privileged females in Kirisuddan village on Saturday (17) at the Kirisuddan Government School. Following the sponsorship provided by Brigadier K.D.C.G.J Tilakaratne, General Officer Commanding, 61 Division, 35 ladies of low-income groups in Kirisuddan village received garments to the value of Rs 50,000/=. It was an initiative aimed at encouraging living standard of the less-privileged females in Kirisuddan village.
